name: rickrolls-api
description: API for getting data from Rickrolls.

scripts.start:migrate:dev: prisma migrate dev --name init && npm run start:dev
scripts.start:migrate:prod: prisma migrate dev --name init && npm run start:prod
scripts.start:dev: npm run build && npm run seed && nodemon dist/server.js
